keyword.name: diary
keyword.description: Diary of a session.

keyword.name: fclose
keyword.description: Close an opened file.

keyword.name: feof
keyword.description: Checks end of file.

keyword.name: ferror
keyword.description: Test for i/o read/write errors.

keyword.name: fgetl
keyword.description: Read string from a file without newline.

keyword.name: fgets
keyword.description: Read string from a file, stopping after a newline, or EOF, or n characters have been read.

keyword.name: fileread
keyword.description: Read contents of file as text.

keyword.name: filewrite
keyword.description: Write text to a file.

keyword.name: fopen
keyword.description: Open a file in Nelson.

keyword.name: fprintf
keyword.description: Writes data to a file.

keyword.name: fread
keyword.description: Read data in binary form to the file specified by the file descriptor fid.

keyword.name: frewind
keyword.description: Set position of stream to the beginning.

keyword.name: fscanf
keyword.description: Reads data from a file.

keyword.name: fseek
keyword.description: Set the file pointer to a location.

keyword.name: fsize
keyword.description: Returns size of an opened file.

keyword.name: ftell
keyword.description: Returns the offset of the current byte relative to the beginning of a file.

keyword.name: fwrite
keyword.description: Write data in binary form to the file specified by the file descriptor fid.

keyword.name: load
keyword.description: load data from .nh5 or .mat file into Nelson's workspace.

keyword.name: save
keyword.description: save workspace variables to .nh5 or .mat file

keyword.name: sscanf
keyword.description: Read formatted data from strings.
